name: Snek3D
description:
This is the classic snake game, as made popular by Nokia on their phones. Except in this one the snake can move on all three axes. Made with Unity and BFXR.

How to play

The snakes head is the dark green block, the body is made of the light green blocks, move the snakes head to get to the spinning yellow blocks, which are the goals.

  • To move forward and backward, Use the Up and Down arrow keys
  • To move left and right, Use the Left and Right arrow keys
  • To move up and down, Use the Q and E keys
  • To spin the entire cube 90 degrees left, Use the leftmost bottom button
  • To spin the entire cube 90 degrees right, Use the rightmost bottom button
  • To restart the game, Use the centre bottom button

Download below for Windows and Mac
